Name: Primal Age
About the game: 'Primal Age' is a 2D top-down battle royale game. The player must dodge enemy attacks, collect meat from enemies and be able to collect more food before the end of each round. The level is constantly getting smaller, so only one will survive! In the Stone Ages, when the life of the first humans depended on amount of meat they had, a new danger appeared - wild forest fires! An uncontrollable fire is surrounding the camp of primitive people and forces them for a massive battle for food! Game Features: Battle Royale mechanics Nice Pixel Art style Challenging gameplay Steam Achievements support
